body: On a plane with this trait, features of the plane change so frequently that it's difficult to keep a particular area stable. Some such planes may react dramatically to specific spells, sentient thought, or the force of will. Others change for no reason.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Morphic Traits/Highly Morphic
name: Highly Morphic
